document_data.mainbody:
he Rusty Nail was the largest inn to be found in the dock section of Hillsfar around 1367 DR. Since it was located outside of the walled city it was perfectly legal for the inn to cater to adventurers.
The inn was situated on the coast of the Moonsea near the main docks.
A bed and meal at the Rusty Nail cost 6 gp per night but that price did not include ale.
